Anomaly Detection¶

tstoolkit.anomaly_detection module¶

class tstoolkit.anomaly_detection.TimeSeriesAnomalyDetector¶

Bases: object

A class for detecting anomalies within a timeseries.

fit(data: DataFrame) → None¶

Fit an anomaly detection model to the time series data.

Parameters:

data (pd.DataFrame) – Timeseries DataFrame.

plot_anomalies() → None¶

Plot the time series data with detected anomalies highlighted.

predict(algorithm: str = 'isolation_forest') → list¶

Predict anomalies in the time series data.

Parameters:

algorithm (str, optional) – The algorithm to use for anomaly detection. Options available are isolation_forest, local_outlier_factor and one_class_svm, defaults to “isolation_forest”

Raises:

ValueError – Unsupported algorithm

Returns:

List of anomaly scores

Return type:

list
